bio.value:
Leigh Blackmore (BCA Writing, Hons) served as second President of the Australian Horror Writers Association (2011). 

A critic, editor, poet and story writer, Leigh works as a freelance manuscript assessor 
and proofreader. 

Recent critical essays appear in Studies in the Fantastic, Lovecraft Annual and Science Fiction, and recent poetry in Weird Fiction Annual No 1 and Spectral Realms.  

His verse collection Spores from Sharnoth & Other Madnesses (P’rea Press, 2008; Rainfall Books, 2010) has garnered extensive acclaim. 

Leigh is also a dedicated ritual magician and musician.

For more info see Leigh's entry at Wikipedia.
